confirmed maternal deaths. Deaths reported to

Zambia
Routine Program Monitoring
SMGL implementing partners in Zambia 
conducted routine monthly or quarterly facility-
level data collection, focusing on pregnancy 
outcomes in facilities in SMGL-supported 
districts.
